title: Introduction to Quadratic Functions
objectives: Identify quadratic functions from their equations
Understand the vertex form of quadratic equations
activities: Exit ticket: Identify vertex of given functions
homework: Complete practice problems 1-15 on quadratic graphing worksheet

title: Character Development in Literature
objectives: Analyze how characters change throughout a story
Identify literary devices used for character development
activities: Discussion: What makes a character memorable?
Small group analysis of character excerpts
homework: Read chapters 8-10 and complete character development chart

title: Causes of World War I
objectives: Identify the main causes of World War I
Analyze the role of alliances in the conflict
Evaluate the significance of the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand
activities: Debate: Could WWI have been prevented?
homework: Research paper outline on chosen WWI topic due next class

title: Cell Structure and Function
objectives: Compare plant and animal cell structures
Understand how cell structure relates to function
activities: Microscope lab: Observing plant and animal cells
homework: Complete lab report on cell observations
